summary: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida (Kelly Macdonald) defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.
cast: Kelly Macdonald|Billy Connolly|Emma Thompson|Julie Walters|Robbie Coltrane|Kevin McKidd|Craig Ferguson|Sally Kinghorn|Eilidh Fraser|Peigi Barker|Steven Cree|Steve Purcell|Callum O'Neill|Patrick Doyle|John Ratzenberger|John Hasler
director: Directors: Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman | 1 more credit »
title: Brave (Indomable)
